title: Could Courteney Cox’s Friends Quiz Be Any Harder?
text:
You don’t need to know a damn thing about Charlie Puth to enjoy this 15-minute video of Monica (sorry, Courteney Cox) quizzing him about Friends trivia, but you do need to brush up on the show’s factoids if you wanna pass this increasingly persnickety quiz. And you won’t even lose your apartment if you fail! Sure, you probably know all about Hugsy the Bedtime Penguin Pal. But what about the exact name of the retro diner Monica had to work at for a season? Or the Thanksgiving meal she made for Chandler during that collegiate flashback episode? The actual Geller Cup is on the line, folks.

Related
description: Courteney Cox quizzed musician Charlie Puth about Friends trivia, and he did pretty well. Test your luck yourself.
